verses.name: 1 Kings 22:45
verses.text: Now the rest of the acts of Jehoshaphat, and his might that he shewed, and how he warred, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?

verses.name: 1 Kings 22:46
verses.text: And the remnant of the sodomites, which remained in the days of his father Asa, he took out of the land.

verses.name: 1 Kings 22:47
verses.text: There was then no king in Edom: a deputy was king.

verses.name: 1 Kings 22:48
verses.text: Jehoshaphat made ships of Tharshish to go to Ophir for gold: but they went not; for the ships were broken at Ezion–geber.
